text: Hernstein is a town in Lower Austria, Austria in the district of Baden bei Wien. ==Municipal divisions== The market municipality of Hernstein has seven Katastralgemeinden: *Grillenberg *Hernstein **Alkersdorf (district) **Aigen (district) *Kleinfeld *Neusiedl bei Grillenberg *Pöllau *Steinhof *Veitsau (In contrast the districts of Steinhof und Veitsau are almost in the neighboring community of Berndorf) ==Population== ==References== *The information in this article is based on and/or translated from that in its German equivalent. ==External links== *Official homepage Category:Cities and towns in Baden District, Austria
title: Hernstein
